statements: UPDATE LivestockData SET weight_gain = 500.0, feed_conversion_ratio = 2.5 WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE FarmLivestock
SET farm_id = 2,
livestock_id = 3
WHERE farm_id = 1 AND livestock_id = 4;
